fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • Adding to Brexit confusion last week, we said that Jean-Claude Juncker was president of the EU council. He is president of the European commission (May facing crushing defeat in Brexit vote, 15 January, page 1). And Peter Altmaier is Germany’s economics and energy minister, not finance minister (We are willing to extend deadline, say French and German ministers, 17 January, page 9). • Other recently corrected articles include: Ion age: why the future will be battery powered ‘In God We Trust’ - the bills Christian nationalists hope will ‘protect religious freedom’ The truth about tights: my search for a pair to end women’s hosiery hell
